q: government's plan to axe the Education Maintenance Allowance( EMA) will go ahead after a motion to rethink the decision was defeated by 59 votes. Education Minister Michael Gove said the money was poorly targeted: If we really believe in generating social mobility in this country then the question we have to ask ourselves is- how is every pound best invested? While Shadow Education Spokesman Andy Burnham said that social mobility would be "thrown into reverse" if the means-tested Â£ 10- Â£ 30 allowances for students in post-16 education were axed, the BBC reports.
